UVI.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.11.16
UVI.description:
ARM: footbridge: fix PCI interrupt mapping

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.11.16 by commit c3efce8cc9807339633ee30e39882f4c8626ee1d, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 30fdfb929e82450bbf3d0e0aba56efbc29b52b52. For more details please see the references link.
